import React from 'react'; // import icons import { BiBed, BiBath, BiArea } from 'react-icons/bi'; const House = ({ house }) => { return (
{house.type}
{house.country}
{house.address}
{house.bedrooms}
{house.bathrooms}
{house.surface}
{house.price} FCFA
); }; export default House;
